snippet: Dominique Strauss-Kahn’s invocation of a life without moralistic limits bears similarities to the credo of the man whose name became a synonym for libertinism, Giacomo Casanova.
lead_paragraph: Dominique Strauss-Kahn’s invocation of a life without moralistic limits bears similarities to the credo of the man whose name became a synonym for libertinism, Giacomo Casanova.

headline.seo: Dominique Strauss-Kahn and Libertinism’s Sordid History
headline.main: Free to Be a Sexual Predator?
headline.print_headline: Free to Be a Sexual Predator?
